title: FBS_EDM (Enum)
text:
TYPE FBS_EDM :
Definition of SF_EDM function block states and its diagnostic values.
Attributes:
qualified_only

rows.Name: IDLE
rows.Comment: The function block is not active (initial state).

rows.Name: INIT
rows.Comment: Block activation startup inhibit is active. Reset required.

rows.Name: OUT_DISABLE
rows.Comment:
EDM control is not active. Timer starts when state is
entered

rows.Name: OUT_ENABLE
rows.Comment: EDM control is active. Timer starts when state is entered

rows.Name: ERR_RESET_1
rows.Comment: Static Reset signal in state 16#8401.

rows.Name: ERR_INIT
rows.Comment:
Similar signals at S_OutControl and Reset (R_TRIG at same
cycle) detected (may be a programming error).

rows.Name: ERR_EDM_11
rows.Comment:
The signal at EDM1 is not valid in the initial actuator
state. In state 16#8810 the EDM1 signal is FALSE when
enabling S_OutControl.

rows.Name: ERR_EDM_12
rows.Comment:
The signal at EDM2 is not valid in the initial actuator
state. In state 16#8810 the EDM2 signal is FALSE when
enabling S_OutControl.

rows.Name: ERR_EDM_13
rows.Comment:
The signals at EDM1 and EDM2 are not valid in the initial
actuator states. In state 16#8810 the EDM1 and EDM2 signals
are FALSE when enabling S_OutControl.

rows.Name: ERR_EDM_21
rows.Comment:
The signal at EDM1 is not valid in the initial actuator
state. In state 16#8810 the EDM1 signal is FALSE and the
monitoring time has elapsed.

rows.Name: ERR_EDM_22
rows.Comment:
The signal at EDM2 is not valid in the initial actuator
state. In state 16#8810 the EDM2 signal is FALSE and the
monitoring time has elapsed.

rows.Name: ERR_EDM_23
rows.Comment:
The signals at EDM1 and EDM2 are not valid in the initial
actuator states. In state 16#8810 the EDM1 and EDM2 signals
are FALSE and the monitoring time has elapsed.

rows.Name: ERR_EDM_31
rows.Comment:
The signal at EDM1 is not valid in the actuator switching
state. In state 16#8000 the EDM1 signal is TRUE and the
monitoring time has elapsed.

rows.Name: ERR_EDM_32
rows.Comment:
The signal at EDM2 is not valid in the actuator switching
state. In state 16#8000 the EDM2 signal is TRUE and the
monitoring time has elapsed.

rows.Name: ERR_EDM_33
rows.Comment:
The signals at EDM1 and EDM2 are not valid in the actuator
switching state. In state 16#8000 the EDM1 and EDM2 signals
are TRUE and the monitoring time has elapsed.

rows.Name: ERR_RESET_21
rows.Comment:
Static Reset signal or same signals at EDM1 and Reset
(rising trigger at Reset and EDM1 at the same time) in state
16#C010.

rows.Name: ERR_RESET_22
rows.Comment:
Static Reset signal or same signals at EDM2 and Reset
(rising trigger at Reset and EDM2 at the same time) in state
16#C020.

rows.Name: ERR_RESET_23
rows.Comment:
Static Reset signal or same signals at EDM1, EDM2, and Reset
(rising trigger at Reset, EDM1, and EDM2 at the same time)
in state 16#C030.

rows.Name: ERR_RESET_31
rows.Comment:
Static Reset signal or same signals at EDM1 and Reset
(rising trigger at Reset and EDM1 at the same time) in state
16#C040.

rows.Name: ERR_RESET_32
rows.Comment:
Static Reset signal or same signals at EDM2 and Reset
(rising trigger at Reset and EDM2 at the same time) in state
16#C050.

rows.Name: ERR_RESET_33
rows.Comment:
Static Reset signal or same signals at EDM1, EDM2, and Reset
(rising trigger at Reset, EDM1, and EDM2 at the same time)
in state 16#C060.

rows.Name: ERR_RESET_41
rows.Comment: Static Reset signal in state 16#C070.

rows.Name: ERR_RESET_42
rows.Comment: Static Reset signal in state 16#C080.

rows.Name: ERR_RESET_43
rows.Comment: Static Reset signal in state 16#C090.
